description: This delicious meal pairs juicy lamb cutlets with a hearty potato and parsnip mash, and is perfect comfort food on a cold winter’s day.
keywords: Lamb chop & cutlets,Seafood free,Low salt,Fresh ingredients,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Lamb,Egg free,Winter,Low sugar,Sesame free,Potato,Zucchini,High protein,High fibre,Parsnip,Soy free,Wheat free,Comfort food,Peanut free
name: Balsamic & Rosemary Lamb Cutlets with Potato & Parsnip Mash Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place potatoes and parsnips into a saucepan and cover with cold water. Bring to the boil over a high heat. Reduce heat and simmer, uncovered for 20 minutes or until tender. Drain. Add butter and milk. Mash until smooth.

Season cutlets on both sides with salt and pepper. Heat oil in a large non-stick frying pan over medium-high heat. Cook cutlets for 2 minutes on each side for medium-rare, or until cooked to your liking.
Add balsamic vinegar and rosemary. Cook for 2 minutes or until vinegar is heated through. Transfer cutlets to a large plate and cover with foil to keep warm. Pour sauce into a jug. Wipe pan clean.

Heat oil in a frying pan over a medium-high heat. Add zucchini and cook, stirring often for 3 minutes or until golden. Serve cutlets with mash and sautéd zucchini. Drizzle cutlets with balsamic sauce.
